title: Redeem Singapore Savings Bonds
full_text: Redeem Singapore Savings Bonds Redeem your Savings Bonds easily via digibank or our DBS/POSB ATMs. Important information The redemption period opens at 6.00pm on the 1st business day of the month and closes at 9.00pm on the 4th last business day of the month. Redemption is only available on Monday to Saturday; 7:00am to 9:00pm (excluding public holidays). A non-refundable transaction fee of S$2 will be charged for each redemption request. Do not submit redemption requests for bonds maturing the following month (e.g., submitting a redemption request in September for a bond maturing in October) as the funds will be automatically credited to your account upon maturity. Submitted redemption requests cannot be cancelled or amended. How to redeem Singapore Savings Bonds (SSB) There are various channels which you may redeem Singapore Savings Bonds with us. The most convenient method would be via digibank mobile. digibank mobile Cash SRS Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. Tap on digiWealth at the bottom navigation. Under Invest, tap on Show all and select SGS. Tap Redeem and select Bought with cash. Enter the Issue Code for the SSB you would like to redeem and tap Next. Enter your Redemption amount (in multiples of S$500 with upper limit of S$200,000). Verify the CDP account number populated. Select your preferred Account for service fee deduction and tap Next. Verify your Redemption Details and tap Submit to confirm your redemption. Note You may check your bank-registered email for a confirmation on the successful status of your application submission. Learn more about how to Update Email Address. Don't have digibank? Get the latest digibank mobile App now! Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. Tap on digiWealth at the bottom navigation. Under Invest, tap on Show all and select SGS. Tap Redeem and select Bought with SRS. Select the SSB that you would like to redeem from the list and tap Next. Enter your Redemption amount (in multiples of S$500 with upper limit of S$200,000). Verify your Redemption Details and tap Submit to confirm your redemption. Note You may check your bank-registered email for a confirmation on the successful status of your application submission. Learn more about how to Update Email Address. Don't have digibank? Get the latest digibank mobile App now! digibank online Cash SRS During the application period, log in to digibank online with your User ID and PIN. Complete the Authentication Process. Click on digiWealth on the left menu and select Invest. Under Product and services on the right, click on SGS. Click on Redeem at the top and select Bought with cash. Enter the Issue Code for the SSB you would like to redeem and click Next. Enter your Redemption amount (in multiples of S$500 with upper limit of S$200,000). Verify the CDP account number populated. Select your preferred Account for service fee deduction and click Next. Verify your Redemption Details and click Submit to confirm your redemption. Note You may check your bank-registered email for a confirmation on the successful status of your application submission. Learn more about how to Update Email Address. Not yet a digibank user? Get Started For customers with ATM/Debit/Credit Card During the application period, log in to digibank online with your User ID and PIN. Complete the Authentication Process. Click on digiWealth on the left menu and select Invest. Under Product and services on the right, click on SGS. Click on Redeem at the top and select Bought with SRS. Select the SSB that you would like to redeem from the list and click Next. Enter your Redemption amount (in multiples of S$500 with upper limit of S$200,000). Verify your Redemption Details and click Submit to confirm your redemption. Note You may check your bank-registered email for a confirmation on the successful status of your application submission. Learn more about how to Update Email Address. Not yet a digibank user? Get Started For customers with ATM/Debit/Credit Card ATM Insert your ATM/Debit/Credit Card and key in your PIN. Select More Services and your preferred Language. Select ESA-IPO / Rights Appln/ Bonds /SSB/SGS/Investments. Select SGS / Singapore Savings Bonds, followed by Singapore Savings Bond Redemption. Confirm the on-screen T&Cs and select the Bond that you wish to apply for. Key in the Year and Month of Bond issuance. Press Enter to proceed. Select your Bond and confirm the on-screen T&Cs. Confirm your CDP Account Number and select Yes to proceed. Key in the Redemption Amount and press Enter. Check your Redemption Details and select Yes to continue. Select your Debiting Account for deduction of the S$2 non-refundable transaction fee. Confirm your Redemption Details and select Confirm to submit your redemption. Find the nearest ATM using our Locator. More information Redemption can be done in any month before the bond matures with no penalty, and the minimum redemption amount for each Savings Bond issue is $500 (and in multiples of $500 up to the amount you have invested). Your cash (along with any accrued interest) will be credited to the designated bank account that is linked to your individual CDP Securities account by the second business day of the following month. Was this information useful? Yes No We welcome your feedback Information is easy to understand and find Yes No Information is useful to answer your inquiries completely Yes No Thanks for your feedback! Weâll continue to work towards serving you better. title: Open a Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS) Account
full_text: Open a Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS) Account Apply for your Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS) Account instantly via digibank online. Part of: Guides > Your Guide to digibank online, Your Guide to DBS Vickers Online Trading Account Important information For Foreigners, please declare your Foreigner status at the branch to update your SRS contribution cap for the year. (Note: This declaration needs to be done yearly as the SRS contribution limit will reset on 1st Jan every year.) How to open a Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS) Account digibank online 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank online with your User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Complete the Authentication Process. 3 Step 3 Click on Apply on the left menu and under Invest, select View all.â 4 Step 4 Select Supplementary Retirement Scheme at the top and click on Apply now under SRS account. 5 Step 5 Read through the information and click Start. 6 Step 6 Check your personal details and select a Reference Account for Signature & Address. Click Yes if you like to make a SRS contribution, enter the Amount for contribution and select the Account you want to contribute from. Click Next. 7 Step 7 Verify your account opening details and click Submit to complete your SRS account opening. Already a digibank user? Login now Forgot User ID or PIN Not yet a digibank user? Get Started For customers with ATM/Debit/Credit Card Branch Alternatively, you may visit any DBS/POSB Branches with your NRIC/Passport to open your SRS Account. More information If you apply via digibank online between 0700hr to 2200hr (Daily) and 0700hr to 1900hr (Last business day of the month), your account will be opened instantly. Account Opening Requirements: All Singaporeans, Permanent Residents (PRs) or foreigners at least 18 years old and not a bankrupt. No existing SRS account or SRS account opening application with another bank. Terms and Conditions Governing SRS Deposit Insurance Scheme Singapore dollar deposits of non-bank depositors and monies and deposits denominated in Singapore dollars under the Supplementary Retirement Scheme are insured by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation, for up to S$75,000 in aggregate per depositor per Scheme member by law. Monies and deposits denominated in Singapore dollars under the CPF Investment Scheme and CPF Retirement Sum Scheme are aggregated and separately insured up to S$75,000 for each depositor per Scheme member. Foreign currency deposits, dual currency investments, structured deposits and other investment products are not insured. Was this information useful? Yes No We welcome your feedback Information is easy to understand and find Yes No Information is useful to answer your inquiries completely Yes No Thanks for your feedback! Weâll continue to work towards serving you better. title: Contribution to Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS) Account
full_text: Contribution to Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS) Account For customers to be eligible for tax relief in 2026, contributions must be made before 7pm via digibank on Wednesday, 31st December 2025. Part of: Guides > Your Guide to digibank Important information Ensure that your SRS contribution does not exceed your balance contribution limit available. If the contribution amount exceeds the balance contribution limit available, the entire amount will be refunded to your funding account. Maximum Annual Contribution Limit Singapore Citizens / PRs S$15,300 Foreigners S$35,700 Annual Foreigner Declaration - Increase your SRS contribution limit For foreigners, please declare your Foreigner status to update your SRS contribution cap for the year. (Note: This declaration needs to be done yearly as the SRS contribution limit will reset on 1st Jan every year) DBS digibot 1 Step 1 Click on located at the bottom right. 2 Step 2 Type SRS Foreigner Declaration into the chat and click Declare now. 3 Step 3 Tap Yes to start SRS Foreigner Declaration request. 4 Step 4 Select your Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS) Account and confirm your Passport No. 5 Step 5 Verify the details and click Submit. 6 Step 6 You have successfully increase your SRS contribution cap. Launch our DBS digibot now! Launch digibot Branch Please ensure you bring along your relevant original copy of the identification documents for verification at any DBS/POSB Branches or Financial Planning Branch. Identification Document: Identification Document: Proof of Employment (if you are working in Singapore) Proof of Employment(if you are working in Singapore) Valid Employment pass / In Principal Approval (IPA) issued by Ministry of Manpower (To update your Foreign Identification Number) How to make a contribution to SRS account There are various channels through which you may make a SRS contribution with us. Contribution via digibank mobile Important: For customers to be eligible for tax relief in YA 2026, contributions must be before 7pm on Wednesday, 31st December 2025 via digibank mobile. 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Tap on Pay & Transfer at the bottom and select Top-ups & Cheques. 3 Step 3 Tap on SRS Account. 4 Step 4 Select the debiting account and enter the amount you wish to contribute. Tap Next. 5 Step 5 Verify your contribution details and tap Top up now. 6 Step 6 You have successfully top up your SRS Account. Note: Ensure SGD - Singapore Dollar is selected as the Currency. We only accept SGD for SRS contributions. Service is only available from Monday to Saturday: 7:00am to 10:00pm (excluding public holidays). Get the latest DBS digibank mobile app now! Contribution via digibank online Important: For customers to be eligible for tax relief in YA 2026, contributions must be before 7pm on Wednesday, 31st December 2025 via digibank online. 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank online with your User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Complete the Authentication Process. 3 Step 3 Click on Pay & Transfer on the left and under Services, click Top-ups & cheques. 4 Step 4 Under Investment top-ups, select Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS) Account. 5 Step 5 Select your debiting account you want to contribute from, enter the Amount you want to contribute and click Next. 6 Step 6 Verify your contribution details and click Top up now. 7 Step 7 You have made a contribution your SRS account successfully. Note: Service is only available from Monday to Saturday: 7:00am to 10:00pm (excluding public holidays). Ensure SGD - Singapore Dollar is selected as the Currency. We only accept SGD for SRS contributions. Already a digibank user? Login now Forgot User ID or PIN Not yet a digibank user? Get Started For customers with ATM/Debit/Credit Card > Contribution via Branch Important: For customers to be eligible for tax relief in YA 2026, contributions must be made before branch closure hours 3:30pm on Wednesday, 31st December 2025 via any DBS/POSB Branches. Visit any DBS/POSB Branches with your NRIC/Passport. Foreigners must declare their foreigner status at the branch to qualify for the foreigner annual contribution limit for SRS. Contribution via Cheque Important: For customers to be eligible for tax relief in YA 2026, contributions must be deposited before 11.30am on Wednesday, 31st December 2025 via cheque. For foreigners, declare your foreigner status at the branch if you have not done so for the year 2025 before depositing the cheque. Issue a local cheque in your name. Write your SRS Account no. at the back of the cheque. Deposit your cheque at any DBS/POSB Branches or Cheque Deposit Box located islandwide. More information Terms and Conditions Governing SRS Deposit Insurance Scheme Singapore dollar deposits of non-bank depositors and monies and deposits denominated in Singapore dollars under the Supplementary Retirement Scheme are insured by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation, for up to S$100,000 in aggregate per depositor per Scheme member by law. Monies and deposits denominated in Singapore dollars under the CPF Investment Scheme and CPF Retirement Sum Scheme are aggregated and separately insured up to S$100,000 for each depositor per Scheme member. Foreign currency deposits, dual currency investments, structured deposits and other investment products are not insured. Was this information useful? Yes No We welcome your feedback Information is easy to understand and find Yes No Information is useful to answer your inquiries completely Yes No Thanks for your feedback! Weâll continue to work towards serving you better. title: Apply for DBS Invest-Saver
full_text: Apply for DBS Invest-Saver Learn how to apply for DBS Invest-Saver easily via digibank online. Who is Eligible? You can set up a DBS Invest-Saver plan if you are: 18 years old and above on the date of application Not a US Person Have a DBS/POSB Deposit Account with us. Learn more on how to Open an Account with DBS/POSB. How to apply for DBS Invest-Saver digibank mobile Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. Tap on digiWealth at the bottom navigation and select Funds & ETFs. Under Explore by categories, tap on Show all and select ETF Invest-Saver. Select the ETF of your choice and tap on Buy. Fill in the necessary details and click Submit to confirm your application. Don't have digibank? title: Update Investment Amount for Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver
full_text: Update Investment Amount for Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver Learn how to change your Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver monthly investment amount easily via digibank. How to update investment amount for Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver There are various channels which you may update investment amount for Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver with us. The most convenient method would be via digibank mobile. digibank mobile 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Tap on digiWealth at the bottom and select Funds & ETFs. 3 Step 3 Under My Funds, tap on the ETF/ Unit Trust plan that you wish to terminate. 4 Step 4 Tap on Manage Savings Plan. 5 Step 5 Enter your new monthly investment amount and tap Update Savings Plan. 6 Step 6 Verify the details and tap on Confirm to change your monthly investment amount. 7 Step 7 You have successfully updated your monthly investment amount for your Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver. Get the latest DBS digibank mobile app now! digibank online Log in to digibank online with your User ID and PIN. Complete the Authentication Process. Under Invest, select More Investment Services. Under Make an Investment, click on Set Up or Update Unit Trust Regular Savings Plan (RSP). Select your Investment Account and click Search. Under Action, click on Update RSP. Enter the New Monthly Investment Amount and click Next. Check your amendment details and click Submit to update your monthly investment amount. More information You will receive an eAdvice to indicate when the updated investment amount will take effect. Was this information useful? Yes No We welcome your feedback Information is easy to understand and find Yes No Information is useful to answer your inquiries completely Yes No Thanks for your feedback! title: Redeem Holdings for Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver
full_text: Redeem Holdings for Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver Learn how to redeem your Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver holdings easily via digibank. How to redeem holdings for Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver There are various channels which you may redeem holdings for Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver with us. The most convenient method would be via digibank mobile. digibank mobile 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Tap on digiWealth at the bottom and select Funds & ETFs. 3 Step 3 Under My Funds, tap on Redeem for the ETF/ Unit Trust plan that you wish to redeem for. 4 Step 4 Enter the number of units you wish to redeem, select the Crediting Account and tap Review. 5 Step 5 Verify your redemption details and tap Place Order to submit your redemption. 6 Step 6 Your redemption request is successfully submitted. Get the latest digibank mobile app now! digibank online Log in to digibank online with your User ID and PIN. Complete the Authentication Process. Under Invest, click on More Investment Services. Under Manage Investments, click on Redeem Unit Trust or Exchange Traded Fund (ETF). Select your Investment Account from the dropdown and click Search. Click on Sell for the ETF/ Unit Trust plan that you wish to redeem for. Enter the number of units to redeem, select the Crediting Account and click Next. Verify the redemption details and click Submit to submit your redemption request. More information Minimum redemption and minimum holding amount varies from unit trust to unit trust. Refer to the respective unit trust's Prospectus and Product Highlights Sheet for more details. Minimum holding amount for Exchange Traded Funds is S$100. Redemption of Exchange Traded Funds on digibank online is applicable for Exchange Traded Funds purchased from DBS in cash only and held by you in a singly basis. Redemption proceeds will usually be credited to your designated account within 7 business days from the submission of your redemption request on digibank online. A confirmation advice will be sent to you to confirm the amount of your redemption proceeds. Was this information useful? Yes No We welcome your feedback Information is easy to understand and find Yes No Information is useful to answer your inquiries completely Yes No Thanks for your feedback! title: Terminate Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver
full_text: Terminate Invest-Saver Learn how to terminate your Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver via digibank. How to terminate Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver There are various channels which you may terminate your Unit Trust/ Invest-Saver with us. The most convenient method would be via digibank mobile. digibank mobile 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Tap on digiWealth at the bottom and select Funds & ETFs. 3 Step 3 Under My Funds, tap on the ETF/ Unit Trust plan that you wish to terminate. 4 Step 4 Tap on Manage Savings Plan. 5 Step 5 Tap on Delete Savings Plan. 6 Step 6 Verify the details and tap on Confirm Delete to submit the termination request. Get the latest DBS digibank mobile app now! digibank online Log in to digibank online with your User ID & PIN. Complete the Authentication Process. Under Invest, select More Investment Services. Under Manage Investments, click on View or Delete Regular Savings Plan (RSP). Select your Investment Account and click on Search. Under Action, click Delete RSP. Verify the details and click Delete to confirm your termination request. More information The cut off to stop deduction for the month is on 14th of the month, 3pm. You will receive an eAdvice to confirm that your termination request has been effected. You can terminate your Invest-Saver plan and leave the holdings in your account and redeem them later. Alternatively, you have the option to reactivate your Invest-Saver plan again. All indicative prices will be updated after 7pm. Unit trust service will be temporarily unavailable: Daily from 7:45pm to 8:15pm and 11pm to 11:30pm Last working day of the month from 7:45pm to 8:45pm Was this information useful? Yes No We welcome your feedback Information is easy to understand and find Yes No Information is useful to answer your inquiries completely Yes No Thanks for your feedback! title: Customer Knowledge Assessment (CKA)
full_text: Customer Knowledge Assessment (CKA) To safeguard investors, the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) requires investors to meet the CKA requirements before they can start investing in unlisted investment products, including funds. Important information Treasures customers (non-accredited investors) will need to pass the Customer Knowledge Assessment first before they can proceed to purchase funds online. How to complete my Customer Knowledge Assessment (CKA) There are various channels which you may complete my Customer Knowledge Assessment (CKA) with us. The most convenient method would be via digibank mobile. digibank mobile 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Tap on Invest at the bottom navigation, scroll to the right and select Investment profile. 3 Step 3 Under Knowledge and experience, tap on Retake assessment. 4 Step 4 Answer the questions to the best of your knowledge and tap Submit. Get the latest DBS digibank(wealth) mobile app now! digibank online 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank online with your User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Complete the Authentication Process. 3 Step 3 Click on Invest on the left menu and select Investment profile. 4 Step 4 Under Knowledge and experience, click on Retake assessment. 5 Step 5 Answer the questions to the best of your knowledge and click Submit. Already a digibank user? Login now Forgot User ID or PIN Not yet a digibank user? Get Started For customers with ATM/Debit/Credit Card More information If you have passed CKA, you will be able to execute your online purchases of unlisted Investment Products, such as Funds. If you have failed CKA, you will not be able to execute your online purchases of unlisted Investment Products. Please seek advice from your Relationship Manager concerning these products. Was this information useful? Yes No We welcome your feedback Information is easy to understand and find Yes No Information is useful to answer your inquiries completely Yes No Thanks for your feedback! Weâll continue to work towards serving you better. Related articles Invest in Funds Online Redeem Funds Online Related articles Invest in Funds Online Redeem Funds Online

title: Invest in Funds Online
full_text: Invest in Funds Online Learn how you can invest in over 200 funds in 12 currencies on DBS digibank. How to invest in funds online There are various channels which you may invest in funds online with us. The most convenient method would be via digibank mobile. digibank mobile 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Tap on Invest at the bottom and select Funds. 3 Step 3 Search for a fund from our fund categories: DBS Focus Funds / Asset class / Sector / Geography / Risk rating / CPF / SRS. 4 Step 4 To invest, tap on the selected fund to view the fund information and tap Buy. 5 Step 5 Enter your purchase Amount and tapÂ Next. 6 Step 6 Verify your details andÂ tap Submit. Get the latest DBS digibank(wealth) mobile app now! digibank online 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank online with your User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Complete the Authentication Process. 3 Step 3 Click on Invest on the left menu and select Funds. 4 Step 4 Search for a fund from our fund categories: DBS Focus Funds / Asset class / Sector / Geography / Risk rating / CPF / SRS. 5 Step 5 To invest, click on the selected fund to view the fund information and click Buy. 6 Step 6 Enter your purchase Amount and clickÂ Next. 7 Step 7 Verify your details andÂ click Submit. Already a digibank user? Login now Forgot User ID or PIN Not yet a digibank user? Get Started For customers with ATM/Debit/Credit Card More information Invest funds in up to 12 different currencies: SGD, USD, AUD, EUR, GBP, CAD, CNH, CHF, JPY, HKD, NZD and SEK. Online Funds can only be purchased using cash option. After your purchase, you can check the order status under Invest > Funds > Order Status. Usually within 1 working day, the order status will be updated to Processing, when your order has been placed with the Fund House. Upon confirmation by the Fund House, you can check your transaction under Wealth Management > Portfolios > Transactions. Usually within 3 to 6 working days, your transaction will be settled and reflected in your Portfolio Holdings page. Only Treasures customers with Wealth Management Account who have passed the Customer Knowledge Assessment (CKA), or TPC/PB customers who are accredited investors can perform Online Funds Investment. Learn more about Customer Knowledge Assessment (CKA). Was this information useful? Yes No We welcome your feedback Information is easy to understand and find Yes No Information is useful to answer your inquiries completely Yes No Thanks for your feedback! full_text: Redeem Funds Online Learn how you can redeem funds online easily using DBS digibank. How to redeem funds online There are various channels which you may redeem funds with us. The most convenient method would be via digibank mobile. digibank mobile 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Tap on Invest at the bottom navigation and select Funds. 3 Step 3 Under Holdings, tap on Sell from the specific funds you wish to sell. 4 Step 4 Enter the Number or the Percentage of units to sell. The total value (indicative) will be automatically calculated. Tap Next. 5 Step 5 Verify your details and tap on Submit to confirm your redemption request. When your application is submitted, you will receive further updates via email and/or SMS. title: Access Online Foreign Exchange (FX) Platform
full_text: Access Online Foreign Exchange (FX) Platform Enjoy better rates on foreign currencies on-the-go with DBS digibank. How to access online Foreign Exchange (FX) platform There are various channels to access online Foreign Exchange (FX) platform with us. The most convenient method would be via digibank mobile. digibank mobile 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Tap on Invest at the bottom navigation and select FX. 3 Step 3 Tap on Place market order. 4 Step 4 Enter the amount and select the currency you want to sell and buy. Tap Next. 5 Step 5 Select your preferred settlement date and tap Next. 6 Step 6 Verify your order details and tap Submit. Get the latest DBS digibank(wealth) mobile app now! digibank online 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank online with your User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Complete the Authentication Process. 3 Step 3 Click on Invest on the left menu and select FX. 4 Step 4 Click on Place market order. 5 Step 5 Enter the amount and select the currency you want to sell and buy. Click Next. 6 Step 6 Select your preferred settlement date and click Next. 7 Step 7 Verify your order details and click Submit. Already a digibank user? Login now Forgot User ID or PIN Not yet a digibank user? Get Started For customers with ATM/Debit/Credit Card More information You can place FX trades from 7:00 AM to 5:00 AM (the next day), Monday to Friday. If selection for Preferred Settlement date in digibank is Today, cut off time for trade is 5:00 PM. The minimum and maximum amounts for Online FX are between SGD 100 and SGD 500K, or equivalent in other currencies. Was this information useful? title: Access Online Loan Drawdown
full_text: Access Online Loan Drawdown Finance your Investments with ease by performing an Online Loan Drawdown from your approved Multi-Currency Revolving Term Loan (MRTL). Important information Only DBS Treasures clients with approved MRTL-TR Credit Facility, DBS Treasures Private Clients/DBS Private Banking Clients with approved MRTL Express Credit Facility can perform Online Loan Drawdown. How to access Online Loan Drawdown There are various channels which you may access Online Loan Drawdown with us. The most convenient method would be via digibank mobile. digibank mobile 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Tap on Invest at the bottom of the navigation. 3 Step 3 Scroll down under Your MRTL loan drawn down, tap on Draw down MRTL . 4 Step 4 Select the Currency, Loan Principal Amount, Account, Tenure and Maturity instruction. Tap Next. 5 Step 5 Verify the details and click on Submit to apply for the loan. Get the latest DBS digibank(wealth) mobile app now! digibank online 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank online with your User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Complete the Authentication Process. 3 Step 3 Click on Invest on the left menu. Scroll through and click on Draw down MRTL on the right section under Your MRTL loan drawn down. 4 Step 4 Select the Currency, Loan Principal Amount, Account, Tenure and Maturity instruction. 5 Step 5 Verify the details and click on Submit to apply for the loan. Already a digibank user? Login now Forgot User ID or PIN Not yet a digibank user? Get Started For customers with ATM/Debit/Credit Card More information You can perform Online Loan Drawdown in 10 different currencies: AUD, CAD, CHF, EUR, GBP, HKD, JPY, NZD, SGD and USD. Minimum drawdown amount per online MRTL Loan Drawdown request is SGD 25K and equivalent for non-SGD currencies for all segments. There are five tenures available for your selection: 1 month, 3 months, 6 months, 9 months and 1 year. Available timings for service: 10:00 AM to 11:45 PM from Monday to Friday, Singapore business days only. Loan application status will be sent via Email, SMS and Inbox alerts. Was this information useful? Yes No We welcome your feedback Information is easy to understand and find Yes No Information is useful to answer your inquiries completely Yes No Thanks for your feedback! title: Set Price Alerts
full_text: Set Price Alerts Learn how to set price alert easily via digibank and be alerted when your target Stock, FX, Funds or Fixed Income Product reaches your target price. How to set price alerts There are various channels to set price alerts with us. The most convenient method would be via digibank mobile. digibank mobile 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Tap on Invest at the bottom of the navigation. 3 Step 3 Select Price alerts at the top and tap on the (+) icon to create a price alert. 4 Step 4 Select the product type Equity, Funds, FX or Fixed income and enter the product name to select the desired product. 5 Step 5 Enter a Target price or % change to trigger the alert. Set a Monitor till date and tap Create to set the alert. Get the latest DBS digibank(wealth) mobile app now! digibank online 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank online with your User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Complete the Authentication Process. 3 Step 3 Click on Invest on the left menu, select Price alerts and click on + Add price alert. 4 Step 4 Select the product type, Equity, Funds, FX or Fixed income and enter the product name to select the desired product. 5 Step 5 Enter a Target price or % change to trigger the alert. Set a Monitor till date and click Create to set the alert. Already a digibank user? Login now Forgot User ID or PIN Not yet a digibank user? Get Started For customers with ATM/Debit/Credit Card More information A maximum of 50 price alerts can be set at any point in time. Price alerts for SG market is based on real time quotes, while price alerts for HK, US, CA, AU, JP and UK markets are based on delayed quotes. To find your triggered, expired or delayed price alerts: digibank mobile: Go to Invest tab, under Alerts, select History. digibank online: Under the Gear Icon, select Manage Price Alerts and click on History. These alerts alerts will be automatically removed after 30 days. Was this information useful? Yes No We welcome your feedback Information is easy to understand and find Yes No Information is useful to answer your inquiries completely Yes No Thanks for your feedback! Weâll continue to work towards serving you better. Related articles DBS Manage Alerts, Offers & Insights Notifications Related articles DBS Manage Alerts, Offers & Insights Notifications

title: Update Investment Objectives Setting (IOS), and Investment Knowledge and Experience (IKE)
full_text: Update Investment Objectives Setting (IOS), and Investment Knowledge and Experience (IKE) Learn how you can update your IOS and IKE via digibank. Important information IOS/IKE renewal services are available online for Single and Joint Accounts. You will receive alert notifications 60 days prior to and on the day following your IOS expiry date. There will also be alerts during the IOS renewal flow. How to update Investment Objectives Setting (IOS), and Investment Knowledge and Experience (IKE) There are various channels which you may update IOS and IKE with us. The most convenient method would be via digibank mobile. digibank mobile 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Tap on Invest at the bottom navigation, scroll to the right and select Investment profile. 3 Step 3 Under Investment profile, tap on Retake questionnaire. 4 Step 4 To review existing profile only, tap onÂ View profile. To renew with changes to profile, tapÂ on Update profile. To renew without change to existing profile, tap on Submit current profile.â 5 Step 5 After the Investment Profile renewal request has been submitted, tap on Next Step: Update IKE. 6 Step 6 To review existing IKE only, tap onÂ View IKE. To renew with changes to IKE, tapÂ on Update IKE. To renew without change to existing IKE, tap on Submit current IKE.â 7 Step 7 After the IKE renewal request has been processed, you can tap onÂ Check status. Get the latest DBS digibank(wealth) mobile app now! digibank online 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank online with your User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Complete the Authentication Process. 3 Step 3 Click on Invest on the left menu and select Investment profile. 4 Step 4 Under Investment profile on the right, click on Retake questionnaire. 5 Step 5 To review existing profile only, click onÂ View profile. To renew with changes to profile, clickÂ on Update profile. To renew without change to existing profile, click on Submit current profile.â 6 Step 6 After the Investment Profile renewal request has been submitted, click Next Step: Update IKE. 7 Step 7 To review existing IKE only, click onÂ View IKE. To renew with changes to IKE, clickÂ on Update IKE. To renew without change to existing IKE, click on Submit current IKE.â 8 Step 8 After the IKE renewal request has been processed, you can click onÂ Check status. Already a digibank user? Login now Forgot User ID or PIN Not yet a digibank user? title: Submit TravellerShield Plus Claim
full_text: Submit TravellerShield Plus Claim Submit your claim online via MyAccount â Chubb's e-Services portal that provides you with instant access to your policies or claims. Part of: Guides > Go Travel with DBS TravellerShield Plus is underwritten by Chubb Insurance Singapore Limited and distributed by DBS Bank Ltd. How to submit TravellerShield Plus claim Submit your claim online via MyAccount Simply: Ensure you have all the required documents ready for submission Then, submit your claim online. Important Note: Your claim must be submitted within 30 days of the event giving rise to your claim. If you need to seek medical treatment in Singapore after returning from your trip, you must do so within 72 hours after your return to Singapore. Submit Claim Documents required for claim submission Benefit being claimed for Required Documents Travel Delay Flight Overbooking or Travel Misconnection Flight Diversion Notification from the airline or transport carrier confirming reason for the delay or flight diversion Delayed Baggage Airline baggage irregularity report or similar confirming delay Travel itinerary Loss of or Damage to Travel Documents Loss of or Damage to Personal Property and Baggage Any document that demonstrates proof of ownership Any document that adequately supports the amount claimed (receipts or repair quotes) Police report in the event of theft Any correspondence you have received from your card issuer in relation to the fraudulent transactions Journey Cancellation Journey Curtailment Receipts from service providers Refund request with service providers Doctor's memo (if applicable) Any other documentation that supports the unforeseen circumstances that led to the cancellation or curtailment Overseas Medical Expenses Continuation of Medical Treatment after Return to Singapore Accidental Emergency Dental Treatment Traditional Chinese Medicine Treatment Medical report; and Proof of cost (e.g. doctorâs invoice/receipt) Overseas Hospital Confinement Benefit Overseas Hospital Confinement Benefit for ICU Hospital Confinement Benefit in Singapore Inpatient discharge summary Medical report; and Hospital bill Accidental Death Copy of death certificate Copy of coroner's dispositions and finding (if applicable) Copy of toxicology report (if applicable) Accidental Permanent Total Disablement Medical practitioner's statement Child Education Grant Copy of birth certificate Personal Liability Letter of Demand of a claim made against you Hijack Letter from airline and police report Home Guard Police Report Proof of purchase (e.g. receipts) Receive claims payout promptly Chubbâs MyAccount allows you to register and track the progress of your claim, at your convenience. Simply: With all required documents ready for assessment, you can expect to receive the claims payout for approved claims within 7 working days. Choose to receive your approved claims payout either via FAST or PayNow to ensure you receive your payment promptly. Was this information useful? Yes No We welcome your feedback Information is easy to understand and find Yes No Information is useful to answer your inquiries completely Yes No Thanks for your feedback! Weâll continue to work towards serving you better. title: Complimentary Travel Insurance
full_text: Complimentary Travel Insurance(Now enhanced with Unauthorised Transactions and Loss of Identification Documents Coverage) Important Note: Complimentary travel insurance will no longer be issued from 1 November 2025 onwards. However, for flight bookings made before 1 November 2025 on DBS Travel & Leisure Marketplace, complimentary travel insurance will remain valid on your trip dates. See below for more information on the policy. Coverage of the Complimentary Travel Insurance is as follows: Key Benefits Maximum Sum Insured Per Main Insured Personâs Policy (SGD) Section 1: Accidental Death and Permanent Disablement Up to 100,000 Section 2: Travel Delay (SGD 50 per 6 hrs) Up to 300 Section 3: Baggage Delay (SGD 50 per 6 hrs) Up to 300 Section 4: Journey Cancellation Up to 1,000 Section 6: Unauthorised Transactions Up to 300 Section 7: Loss of Identification Documents Up to 300 Section 5: COVID-19 Coverage Maximum Sum Insured Per Main Insured Personâs Policy (SGD) Overseas Medical Expenses (Inpatient only) Up to 500 Overseas Quarantine Benefit (SGD 100 per day) Up to 500 Overseas Hospital Confinement Benefit (SGD 100 per day, 2 days excess) Up to 500 Journey Cancellation (Within 15 days prior to departure) Up to 1,000 Journey Curtailment Up to 200 Repatriation of Mortal Remains Up to 1,000 Emergency Medical Evacuation & Repatriation Up to 1,000 Overseas Emergency Assistance 24-Hour Hotline Available Note: Accompanying travellers will be covered as part of the Complimentary Travel Insurance provided for flights originating from Singapore. Only Singapore Residents are eligible for the Complimentary Travel Insurance. A Singapore Resident means a Singapore citizen, Singapore Permanent Resident, or foreigner holding a valid Work Permit, Employment Pass, Dependantâs Pass, Long-Term Visit Pass or Student Pass. For travel insurance with higher coverage and additional benefits (such as coverage for non-COVID-19 related overseas medical expenses due to accident or sickness), you may wish to purchase TravellerShield Plus. Coverage period I just booked a flight via DBS Travel & Leisure Marketplace. How long does the Complimentary Travel Insurance policy cover me? For flights booked via DBS Travel & Leisure Marketplace If you are travelling on a return trip commencing from and ending in Singapore, your coverage starts on the scheduled departure date and ends on the scheduled arrival date, as indicated on your flight itinerary. However, the COVID-19 Cover (Section 5) is only applicable for up to 30 days, starting from your scheduled departure date. If you are travelling on a one-way trip, your coverage (across all benefits from Sections 1 to 7) starts on the scheduled departure date from Singapore for up to 15 days. COVID-19 cover Does my policy cover me for COVID-19 related claims? Yes, COVID-19 Cover is available for all policies issued. It covers travel to all destinations*, except Cuba. View all COVID-19 benefits. *Please note that this is subject to change, depending on the development of the COVID-19 situation. Does the COVID-19 Cover also include expenses related to COVID-19 diagnostic tests? No, any expenses related to COVID-19 diagnostic tests, including pre-departure tests and post-arrival tests, are not covered under this benefit. More information For more information on the Key Benefits, you may refer to the Complimentary Travel Insurance Product Summary.Â Learn more.Â Was this information useful? Yes No We welcome your feedback Information is easy to understand and find Yes No Information is useful to answer your inquiries completely Yes No Thanks for your feedback! Weâll continue to work towards serving you better. Related articles Submit TravellerShield Plus Claim Related articles Submit TravellerShield Plus Claim

title: Apply for CardCare/ Cashcare Protector
full_text: Apply for CardCare/ Cashcare Protector A protection plan that pays off the outstanding amount on your DBS Cashline Account and DBS/ POSB Credit Card(s) in the event of unforeseen circumstances. How to apply for CardCare/ Cashcare Protector digibank mobile 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or digibank User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Tap More at the bottom, under Apply select CardCare/CashCare. 3 Step 3 Read the product information and tap Continue. 4 Step 4 Select the Protector Plan that you wish to sign up for and tap Next. 5 Step 5 Review your application details and tap Submit. 6 Step 6 You have successfully applied for CardCare/ CashCare Protector. Get the latest DBS digibank mobile app now! digibank online 1 Step 1 Log in to digibank online with your User ID & PIN. 2 Step 2 Complete the Authentication Process. 3 Step 3 Click Apply on the left menu and under Cards, click on View all. 4 Step 4 Under Card Services, select CardCare / CashCare Protector and click on Apply now. 5 Step 5 Read through the information and click on Start. 6 Step 6 Verify plan selected and click Next. 7 Step 7 Verify the application details and click Submit to confirm your request. Already a digibank user? Login now Forgot User ID or PIN Not yet a digibank user? Get Started For customers with ATM/Debit/Credit Card Was this information useful? Yes No We welcome your feedback Information is easy to understand and find Yes No Information is useful to answer your inquiries completely Yes No Thanks for your feedback! Weâll continue to work towards serving you better. title: Card Replacement
full_text: Here's what you need to know when replacing a Credit Card. CardReplacement General Information Card Specific Information Card Replacement Replace a Lost Card If your Credit card is Lost or Stolen, please block your card(s) immediately using our online services and request for a replacement instantly. Learn more Replace a Damaged/Worn Out/Expired Card Holding on to a damaged, worn out or expired card? Request for a card replacement instantly online! Learn more General Information Activate Replacement Card You can activate your new card easily using digibank, DBS digibot or at our DBS/POSB ATM and Video Teller Machine (VTM). Learn more Update Recurring Bill Payments with Billing Organisations Find out what you need to do to update your Recurring Bill Payments paid to Billing Organizations using your Credit or Debit Cards. Learn more Existing DBS Rewards, Points, Fund Transfer and Instalments DBS Rewards, DBS Points, Special Interest Rate Fund Transfer, Instalment Loan and Instalment Payment Plan will not be affected. When will I receive my replacement card? You will receive your replacement Card & PIN (if any) separately within 5 working days from the requested date. Learn more I did not receive a PIN mailer or have forgotten my pin? If you did not receive a PIN mailer or have forgotten your PIN, you may activate your replacement card and reset your PIN instantly via digibank. Find out how you can Reset Card PIN. Learn more Card Specific Information DBS Altitude Visa Card If you have Priority Pass, please update your new Altitude Card details via the Priority Pass website through your Digital Membership. DBS Esso Card Smiles Points will be automatically linked and transferred to the new card upon replacement. Existing Speedpass has been ceased W.E.F 31 March 2019 and Speedpass will no longer be issued by Exxon Mobil. DBS Live Fresh Card If you have any remaining EZ-link value in your old card, refer to Refund EZ-Link/NETS FlashPay Value. DBS Takashimaya Card Your Takashimaya Points will not be transferred. You may visit Takashimaya Customer Service counter to request for your Takashimaya Points to be transferred from the old to the new card (subject to approval). POSB Everyday Card Daily $ will not be affected, if you have any remaining EZ-link value in your old card, refer to Refund EZ-Link/NETS FlashPay Value. SAFRA DBS Card SAFRA $ will not be affected. Here's what you need to know when replacing an ATM/Debit Card. Card Replacement General Information Card Specific Information Card Replacement Replace a Lost Card If your ATM, Debit or Credit card is Lost or Stolen, please block your card(s) immediately using our online services and request for a replacement instantly. Learn more Replace a Damaged/Worn Out/Expired Card Holding on to a damaged, worn out or expired card? Request for a card replacement instantly online! Learn more General Information Activate Replacement Card You can activate your new card easily using digibank, DBS digibot or at our DBS/POSB ATM and Video Teller Machine (VTM). Learn more Update Recurring Bill Payments with Billing Organisations Find out what you need to do to update your Recurring Bill Payments paid to Billing Organizations using your Credit or Debit Cards. Learn more When will I receive my replacement card? You will receive your replacement Card & PIN (if any) separately within 5 working days from the requested date. Learn more I did not receive a PIN mailer or have forgotten my pin? If you did not receive a PIN mailer or have forgotten your PIN, you may activate your replacement card and reset your PIN instantly via digibank. Find out how you can Reset Card PIN. Learn more Card Specific Information DBS Takashimaya Card Your Takashimaya Points will not be transferred. You may visit Takashimaya Customer Service counter to request for your Takashimaya Points to be transferred from the old to the new card (subject to approval). DBS Visa Debit Card By performing this card replacement, your existing card will be terminated immediately. If you have any remaining NETS FlashPay value in your old card, refer to Refund EZ-Link/NETS FlashPay Value. PAssion POSB Debit Card By performing this card replacement, your existing card will be terminated immediately. If you have any remaining EZ-link value in your old card, refer to Refund EZ-Link/NETS FlashPay Value. Please contact the National Library Board at [email protected] to report loss of your PAssion POSB Debit Card. If loss is not reported, any charges incurred on the lost card, such as fines incurred on loans, lost items and reservation will be charged. SAFRA DBS Card SAFRA $ will not be affected.

Learn more General Information Activate Replacement Card You can activate your new card easily using digibank, DBS digibot or at our DBS/POSB ATM and Video Teller Machine (VTM). Learn more Update Recurring Bill Payments with Billing Organisations Find out what you need to do to update your Recurring Bill Payments paid to Billing Organizations using your Credit or Debit Cards. Learn more When will I receive my replacement card? You will receive your replacement Card & PIN (if any) separately within 5 working days from the requested date. Learn more I did not receive a PIN mailer or have forgotten my pin? If you did not receive a PIN mailer or have forgotten your PIN, you may activate your replacement card and reset your PIN instantly via digibank. Find out how you can Reset Card PIN. Learn more Card Specific Information DBS Takashimaya Card Your Takashimaya Points will not be transferred. You may visit Takashimaya Customer Service counter to request for your Takashimaya Points to be transferred from the old to the new card (subject to approval). DBS Visa Debit Card By performing this card replacement, your existing card will be terminated immediately. If you have any remaining NETS FlashPay value in your old card, refer to Refund EZ-Link/NETS FlashPay Value. PAssion POSB Debit Card By performing this card replacement, your existing card will be terminated immediately. If you have any remaining EZ-link value in your old card, refer to Refund EZ-Link/NETS FlashPay Value. Please contact the National Library Board at [email protected] to report loss of your PAssion POSB Debit Card. If loss is not reported, any charges incurred on the lost card, such as fines incurred on loans, lost items and reservation will be charged. SAFRA DBS Card SAFRA $ will not be affected.

title: Online Equity Trading
full_text: Getting Started Navigate our step-by-step online equity trading guide using the tabs above. Click "Learn More" to explore each feature. Access Equity Trading Platform Ease your investment journey with an online equity portfolio across 8 major markets. Learn more Trade Equity Online Search for a stock Looking for a specific stock? Find it in seconds with a dedicated search bar. Learn more Place an order Buy or sell stocks in a few simple steps to capitalise on windows of opportunity. Learn more View order status Monitor your working or submitted orders at a glance. Learn more Amend an order Amend your order in a few simple steps. Learn more Cancel an order Change your mind about your stock order? Cancel it in a few simple steps. Learn more Glossary of abbreviations Master stock market abbreviations with the in-site glossary. Learn more Tools & Features Watchlist Create and customise a watchlist of your favourite stocks to stay on top of the market. Learn more Advanced Market Data Customise and view up to 20 levels of Bid and Ask prices and monitor real-time price streams. Learn more Transaction Screener Identify market movers with a filter for large, real-time transactions in Singapore and Hong Kong exchanges. Learn more Stock Screener Narrow and screen investment opportunities through ready-made or customised strategies across 8 markets. Learn more Stock Comparer Make well-informed decisions with over 100 parameters to build your stock comparison. Learn more Charting Analyse and chart stock price movements with technical tools to forecast trends and develop strategies. Learn more Market Entitlement View your market data streaming entitlement of the exchanges on which you wish to trade. Learn more Customise Portfolio Create and modify a customised view of all your holdings for ease of monitoring. Learn more Guides and Resources Fee schedules, important notices, user guide & FAQs, and more at your fingertips. Learn more Discover Access Market Overview Research reports, market news, and insights at a glance. Learn more Market News Confidently navigate market ups and downs with the latest news. Learn more Market Insights Bank on DBSâ dedicated investment research arm for economic and strategic insights. Learn more Research Reports Stay ahead of the market with reports from DBS Group Research. Learn more Manage Account Stock Holdings Access an overview of the stock holdings in your Wealth Management Account. Learn more Transaction History Checking up on past transactions? View your history in detail with just a few clicks. Learn more Trading Eligibility Equity Trading Eligibility View your eligibility to trade across 8 major global markets. Learn more U.S. Market Data Agreement View U.S. equities and prices online when you accept U.S. Exchange Market Data Agreement. Learn more Customer Account Review (CAR) For Listed Specified Investment Products (ETFs, CBBCs, DLCs, etc) Trade more complex investment products by completing your Customer Account Review. Learn more Risk Warning Statement (RWS) For foreign shares/markets Acknowledge the Risk Warning Statement to trade overseas listed products online. Learn more More with DBS digibank Access your Wealth Portfolio Access your wealth portfolio to manage your wealth easily on DBS digibank. Learn more View Portfolio Holdings Learn how you can access the list of holdings held in your Portfolio easily on DBS digibank. Learn more View Portfolio Transaction History View the list of pending and settled transactions of your portfolio. Learn more Manage your Notification Settings Find out how you can manage your Emails, SMS, and push notifications. Learn more eCorporate Action Learn how you can submit your preferred option for Voluntary Corporate Action events online. Learn more Access eAdvice and eStatements View your eAdvice and eStatements anytime, anywhere on DBS digibank. Learn more Set Price Alerts Be alerted when your target Equity, Funds, Fixed Income or FX Product reaches your target price. Learn more Customer Knowledge Assessment (CKA) For Unlisted Specified Investment products To safeguard investors, the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) requires investors to meet the CKA requirements before they can start investing in unlisted investment products, including funds. Learn more More Investment Functions on DBS digibank Stay in control and experience the convenience of conducting your banking transactions, managing your wealth and investments, anytime and anywhere. Learn more Was this information useful? Yes No

title: Go Shopping with DBS
full_text: Online shopping is convenient and can often save you money. Here are some useful tips and information to make your online shopping experience a fun, safe and gratifying one! 1. Planning to shop 2. Making payments 3. Track your spending 4. Benefits & rewards 1. Planning to shop Apply for a New Card Interested in getting a DBS or POSB Credit Card? Simply submit your application via DBS website or digibank. Learn more Apply for a Supplementary Card If youâre an existing DBS/POSB credit cardholder, you can easily apply for a Supplementary Card and get instant approval via digibank mobile. Learn more Online Safety Learn how you can secure your computer from phishing and intrusions with our useful tips. Learn More Transact & Withdraw Foreign Currency Overseas Enable your Card for overseas usage to transact and withdraw foreign currency overseas. Avoid foreign exchange and debit card fees by using a DBS Visa Debit Card linked to any of our multi-currency accounts (e.g. My Account or Multiplier). Learn More Check Credit Card Available Limit You can simply check your credit card available limit via digibank and Phone Banking. Learn more Apply for Temporary Credit Limit Increase Apply for a Credit Card Temporary Limit Increase via digibank online or Online Form. Learn More Update ATM/Debit Card Limits Learn how you can update your ATM/Debit Card's NETS, Withdrawal and 3rd Party Funds Transfer limit instantly via digibank. Learn More Overseas Card Transaction Fees Transactions made overseas or through overseas-based online merchants (including refunds and reversals) are subject to foreign transaction fees of up to 3.25%. This includes the bankâs administrative fees and charges imposed by the card associations (Visa/Mastercard/American Express/UnionPay). Learn More 2. Making payment eNets (D2Pay) Application If you are a digibank user, you can apply for this service to pay participating merchants online. Learn more Apply for My Preferred Payment Plan Bought something expensive using your credit card and wish to have an option to pay it off over time? Split your purchases into monthly instalments of up to 24 months. Learn more Transfer Funds to Other Bank Accounts in Singapore Learn how to send SGD or foreign currency to another DBS/POSB account or a different bank in Singapore. You can also schedule transfers to be sent out on a later date using digibank. Learn more 3. Track your spending Check Credit Card Transaction Details Trying to recall your past transactions? You can now view details of pending and declined transactions such as category, payment type, transaction approval code, reason for decline, and up to past 6 months of transaction history via digibank mobile. Learn more Check Debit Card Transaction Details You can now check your debit card transaction details, whether it is settled, pending or declined via digibank mobile! title: Go Travel with DBS
full_text: Planning your travel is exciting and can be rewarding if done well. Whether you are hitting the road or taking to the skies, we have useful information that can help you travel worry free. 1. Planning to Travel 2. Insuring your Travel 1. Planning your travel Apply for Temporary Credit Limit Increase Apply for a Credit Card Temporary Limit Increase via digibank. Learn more Enable/Disable Card for Overseas Use Learn how to enable / disable your card's overseas usage easily using digibank or at our DBS/POSB ATM. Learn more Transact & Withdraw Foreign Currency Overseas Enable your Card for overseas usage to transact and withdraw foreign currency overseas. Avoid foreign exchange and debit card fees by using a DBS Visa Debit Card linked to any of our multi-currency accounts (e.g. My Account or Multiplier). Learn More Update ATM/Debit Card Limit You can change your Debit Card's spending limit via digibank. Learn more Credit Card Payment Cut-off Times Perform instant payment for your DBS/POSB Credit Cards via digibank. Alternatively, other non-instant channels includes Phone Banking, ATM, AXS, GIRO, Cheque and Cash Payments. Learn More Overseas Card Transaction Fees Transactions made overseas or through overseas-based online merchants (including refunds and reversals) are subject to foreign transaction fees of up to 3.25%. Learn More 2. Insuring your Travel TravellerShield Plus Purchase TravellerShield Plus Travel Insurance today and enjoy a hassle-free holiday! Learn more Travelling overseas should be a fun and relaxing experience. Whether you are hitting the road or taking to the skies, we have useful information that can help you travel worry free. 1. Transaction Issues 2. Cash Withdrawal 3. Report Lost or Stolen Card 1. Transaction Issues Declined Transactions Common reasons include card not activated, insufficient credit limit or incorrect card details being entered. Learn more Unable to Withdraw and Transact Common reasons include exceeding daily withdrawal limit, using an expired or blocked card, card not activated for overseas usage or not supported by overseas ATM. Learn more Reset Card PIN Change your Card PIN immediately via digibank or Video Teller Machine (VTM). Learn More Update ATM/Debit Card Limit Learn how you can update your ATM/Debit Card's NEsTS, Spending, Withdrawal and 3rd Party Funds Transfer limit instantly via digibank. Learn More 2. Cash Withdrawal Change overseas funds transfer limits Increase your limit up to S$200,000 easily using digibank. Learn more Cash Advance Get instant cash when you need it. Learn more Cash Advance Fee Cash Advance Fee of 8% will be levied on the amount withdrawn per transaction, subject to a minimum of S$15 per transaction. Learn more Overseas Withdrawal Charges Withdrawal fees are waived if you withdraw using Plus/Cirrus/UnionPay Card via Westpac Group ATMs in Australia and DBS Hong Kong, Plus/Cirrus Card in DBS Taiwan and Plus Card via DBS ATMs in India and Indonesia. There will be a fee for withdrawals via all other overseas ATMs. Learn more 3. Report Lost or Stolen Card Report Lost or Stolen Card If your ATM, Debit or Credit card is Lost or Stolen, please block your card(s) immediately using our online services and request for a replacement instantly. Learn more Welcome home, we hope you had a fruitful trip. Complete your travel on a sweet note with these useful tips. 1. Safeguard your Card 2. Track your Spending 3. Benefits & Rewards 4. TravellerShield Plus Assistance 1. Safeguard your Card Enable/ Disable Card for Overseas Use Learn how to disable your card's overseas usage easily using digibank or at our DBS/POSB ATM. Learn more Customise your Card Functions with Payment Controls Payment control allows you to enable the functions that you need and disable what you don't. Learn more Update ATM/Debit Card Limit You can change your Debit Card's spending limit via digibank. Learn more 2. Track your spending Check Credit Card Transaction Details Credit Card transactions are not immediately reflected in your statements. Learn how you can make use of our digital solutions to check your recent transactions. Learn more View Debit Card Transaction Details You can now check your debit card transaction details, whether it is settled, pending or declined via digibank mobile! Learn more Check Account Transaction You can check your transactions using DBS digibot, digibank and Phone Banking. Learn more View your eStatements and eAdvices Simply login to digibank to access and view your statements or retail advices online at your convenience. Learn more Understanding Statements Simply login to digibank to access and view your statements or retail advices online at your convenience. Learn more Pay Credit Card Bills You can pay credit cards bills easily using digibank and other self-service machines. Learn more 3. Benefits & Rewards Convert DBS Points to Miles You can convert your DBS Points to KrisFlyer miles, Asia Miles, Qantas Points or Air Asia BIG Points via DBS Rewards Website. Learn more Redeem Rewards or Offset Spending using DBS Points, Daily$ & Safra$ You can redeem DBS Points, Daily$ & Safra$ easily via DBS PayLah!, digibank, DBS Rewards website, or Pay with Points In-Store and online on participating merchantsâ website/mobile app. Learn more Check your DBS Points, Daily$ & Safra$ Check your available DBS Points, Daily$ & Safra$ via DBS PayLah!, DBS digibot, digibank, your monthly statement, or DBS Rewards website. Learn more DBS Points Expiry Some DBS Credit Cards have no expiry dates for DBS Points! For those with expiry dates, DBS Points will expire one year from the quarterly period in which they were earned. Learn more 3. TravellerShield Plus Assistance Submit TravellerShield Plus Claim Submit your claims online within one month after your return to Singapore with all supporting documents. Learn more
